author: USA TODAY, Savannah Behrmann, USA TODAY
title: Fauci takes heat from protestors of stay-at-home orders, says ignoring guidelines will 'backfire'
description: Fauci's warnings directly contradicted Trump's calls to "liberate" states where people protested social distancing. Both Trump and Fauci have disputed each other's statements during the course of the epidemic.
content:
President Trump and Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, have disagreed on vaccines and hydroxychloroquine.
USA TODAY
